column3:
Kageel Ja fears the dimming of the lights.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the requested materials to Kageel Ja.

<If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),16))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Mine <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> near Ankledeep<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),17))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Gather <SheetEn(Item,3,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> near Ankledeep<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),2,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/><If(Equal(IntegerParameter(4),18))><If(LessThan(IntegerParameter(1),IntegerParameter(2)))>Catch <SheetEn(Item,1,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> at Ankledeep<Else/>Deliver <SheetEn(Item,2,IntegerParameter(5),1,1)/> to Kageel Ja</If><Else/></If></If></If>.
So does Gok Golma spend yet another day bathed in golden light... Ever since the Boonewa mages worked their magicks, the crops have never looked healthier.
If I recall, it was you who procured the energy-rich vessels that helped make the lights a possibility in the first place.
Aside from the power provided by the base vessel, however, it seems the spell also requires a consumable catalyst to sustain its effect. As such, I must once again call upon your gathering expertise.
And thanks to the spell catalyst you so kindly acquired, the illumination over the gainery remains undimmed...for the moment.
Unfortunately, no source of energy lasts forever. If you're willing to lend a hand, the time has come to replenish our stocks.
The ice crystals mined around the area of Ankledeep should be sufficient for our needs. The purer, the better.
The water crystals found in the area of Ankledeep should be sufficient for our needs. The purer, the better.
The crystalfish caught in Ankledeep should be sufficient for our needs. I imagine you have some golden stonefly nymphs left over for bait.
Please head to Ankledeep and dig up the purest ice crystals you can find.
Please head to Ankledeep and gather the purest water crystals you can find.
Please head to Ankledeep with a pocketful of golden stonefly nymphs, and see if you can land us a sizable crystalfish.
Welcome back, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Heh...you have the look of a person who's found exactly what they were looking for.
Yes, our lights should shine all the brighter with such a dazzling source of energy.
I cannot overstate the beneficial effects of the illumination, especially given the way our vegetables have thrived beneath its glow...
We've seen steady increases in both yield and variety of crops, which means a more bountiful dinner table for everyone in Mamook! Your contributions, past, present, and future, are most appreciated.
